section.name: Building the Platform
section.p: Before attempting to build the bootstrap build system please install Apache Ant version 1.6.4 or later and SVN 1.0 or later.

subsection.name: SVN Checkout
subsection.p: The following svn command will checkout the main development branch of the DPML repository to a directory named 'main' (you can change main to a locally preferred directory name).
DO NOT USE THE DPML_HOME DIRECTORY FOR YOU DEVELOPMENT CONTENT.
